cause.description:
Ovarian Cancer Research Fund (OCRF) is a 501(c)3 not-for-profit organization devoted to funding research to develop early diagnostic detection methods and ultimately end ovarian cancer.
As OCRF strives to find an early diagnostic tool and a cure, it also seeks to support patients and their loved ones in understanding this disease and its treatment as well as to provide outreach programs and raise public awareness.
1. To develop and implement an early detection program
2. To improve the mortality rate, management and long-term survival of women with ovarian cancer
3. To gain fundamental understanding of the causes of ovarian cancer
cause.mission: Our mission is to fund research to find a method of early detection and ultimately a cure for ovarian cancer.
cause.name: Ovarian Cancer Research Fund
